newsitem.title: UK: PRESS DIGEST - LONDON-BASED ARAB NEWSPAPERS - JULY 27.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - LONDON-BASED ARAB NEWSPAPERS - JULY 27.

text.p: These are some of the leading stories in two London-based Arabic-language newspapers on Sunday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- U.S. Middle East coordinator Dennis Ross intends to head to the region with a new mediation role in the peace process.
- World Bank agrees to offer $36 million to Yemen to finance development projects.
- Abu Dhabi inaugurates a $1 billion project to supply Dubai with gas.
- Iranian president will visit Saudi Arabia in November.
- Forty Syrian pharmaceutical firms seek contracts in Iraq.
- United Arab Shipping Co to add 10 containers worth $660 million to its fleet.
